column4: hie everybody, my samsung x30 notebook can wake up after suspend or hibernate. anybody has a clue what to do about it?
unfortunately the Samsung folk don't let Linux developers know about how their ACPI stuff works at a bios level so it's a bit tricky. try to make sure that the package acpi-support is installed.
that's perhaps your best bet. alternatively, search for your model here: http://www.linux-laptop.net/
